stimulusHtml: Is there a time t at which the particle is farthest to the right? If yes, explain why and give the value of t and the x-coordinate of the position of the particle at that time. If no, explain why not.

features.html:
A particle moving along a curve in the xy-plane has position (x(t),y(t)) , at time t > 0 , where

At time t = 3, the particle is at the point (5,4).
